abstract: Carl C. Icahn wants you to know that, now that his proxy battle with Yahoo is over, he intends to blog more often. And he hinted that an upcoming post will be inspired by a recent article in The Wall Street Journal.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn wants you to know that, now that his proxy battle with Yahoo is over, he intends to blog more often. And he hinted that an upcoming post will be inspired by a recent article in The Wall Street Journal.

headline.main: After the Truce, Yahoo Reports and Icahn Blogs
